WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
After making changes to several files and then selecting SaveAll the tsc -w process recompiles the entire project once for each file.  A tiny delay before compiling should resolve this.  Would also be nice if a simple status was output (waiting, compiling, aborting, complete) and not a list of every file being compiled.

I found this helpful as an temporary solution to build status: 
http://stackoverflow.com/questions/17592368/output-build-complete-when-typescript-compiler-is-done
WorkItem.Summary: When watching, add a slight delay before recompiling
